Great game my main games for years now highest rank ive gotten was LEM but these days unless you have an amazing trust factor and spend 1000hours into the game or you play faceit, esea you most likely going to run into hackers rage botting or (Legit Hacking) So if your a new comer id recommend having a good steam account with years on it with loads of hours spread across different games and dont play f2p it is riddled with rage hackers
